quest.name: Your Gil's No Good Here
journal:
 Quest Sync
Jezul Ahuatan the Second knows that where the monetary system holds no sway, barter must come into greater play.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 16 and above.

Jezul Ahuatan has bamboozled you into crafting spare tank components. But first, you must reap what you have─or rather, some other botanist has─sown. The forests around Camp Dragonhead are rich in quality timber; harvest fifteen ruby spruce branches and five ruby spruce logs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

Your arms are sticky with sap, and sawdust powders your hair. Ah, to be a lumberjack and work all day! The smell of fresh-cut spruce will surely lift the spirit of even the one they call the sullen sutler.
You have acquired a set of spare tank component materials. Present them to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead in order to gain access to the crafting facility under his care.

Norbettaux has prepared the crafting facility for your use. With the materials you have obtained, synthesize two high-quality components for a spare ceruleum tank, and deliver them to Jezul Ahuatan at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Specialization II wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Norbettaux.

Jezul Ahuatan is excessively enthused about your bout of gathering and crafting, which has been rather heavier on industry than inspiration. Your ability to complete even the most tedious of tasks is apparently a gift. Cherish it.
objectives: As a botanist, harvest ruby spruce branches near Camp Dragonhead.
As a botanist, harvest ruby spruce logs near Camp Dragonhead.
Deliver the ruby spruce wood to the sullen sutler at Camp Dragonhead.
Present the spare tank component materials to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead.
Synthesize spare tank components Deliver the spare tank components to Jezul Ahuatan the Second.

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Quality spare tank components, you can make? Solid metal and durable, they must be. No holding of cider, this is for, but─sqqquawk─spare ceruleum.

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! Time to prepare components, you have? Gasket sealant, required for the spare ceruleum tanks, for us you can make. No pressing reason, we have─but a gasket in claw, better than two on order is!

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squawk! A helping claw, you will extend? Short of sturdy barrels for ceruleum, we are. Arrived, they did, from a cut-rate cooper and...squawkka-wak! Get, you do, what you pay for!

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: An understanding, we have, with a sutler at Camp Dragonhead. The materials, provide them, he can. Trade for them─only trade, he will. Like him, I do, for one so featherless. Somber as a raven, he is. Trust for gil, he has not.

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Hiss at me, he did; fierce as goose, he was. “Gil is naught but a construct,” said he. Full of quarrel, you featherless ones are. Fifteen ruby spruce branches and five logs of the same, this sutler wants. Gather them with ease, you can, up Camp Dragonhead way.

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Point to the crafting facility and no more, he will. Squee-squee, dance to tune played by the small and sly one, the sullen sutler will not!

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Sqqquawk! Those tank components sooner rather than later, I do want. Expect your delivery, I do. Bite my claws, I shall.

dialogue.name: PLANTMERCHANT01520
dialogue.text: Brrr... Even the weather's conspiring to put me out of business. That's right, just freeze your arse off till you've nothing to even sit on. That's the way of it with gods an' heroes. Leave a working man without an arse to call his own.

dialogue.name: PLANTMERCHANT01520
dialogue.text: One of Tataramu's pals? Hmph. Here's your material, over there's where you'll find Norbettaux. The crafting facility's his business, so don't bother me about it.

dialogue.name: PLANTMERCHANT01520
dialogue.text: What's the matter, the cold take your wits? Off with you─the crafting facility's not my watch.

dialogue.name: NORBETTAUX
dialogue.text: Ah, the one that Master Tataramu spoke of. Welcome to our humble facility! I see that you've spent some time in the woods today─but the real work begins now!

dialogue.name: NORBETTAUX
dialogue.text: Ah, this is your material? Let me weigh out what you need...ample, ample. A dyspeptic he may be, but that sutler is scrupulous down to the last onze. Now then, the facility is at your disposal, my canny crafter!

dialogue.name: NORBETTAUX
dialogue.text: I shall store the excess material for your benefit. You need but come and find me if you run short, or wish to use the facility again.

dialogue.name: NORBETTAUX
dialogue.text: Done with the crafting and ready to deliver, if I'm not mistaken. I need hardly remind you of such a trivial fact, but this crafting facility─and your excess materials─will always be available should you feel an unaccountable need to redo this task. Any friend of Master Tataramu is a friend of mine!

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squawk, my components, you have? Build the spare tanks this turn, we can?

dialogue.name: JEZULAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squee-squee, fast delivery, this is─and great work, it is! Praise you as claw that grips, Chief Totoloc would. No harrying, you need. No cheating, you do. Squawk! Fortunate, I am, to have your service.

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To complete this quest, you will need to change your class to botanist by equipping a hatchet to your main hand.
